name: JETMAN
description:
A jump action game that you can play with one button!

Feel free to play and clear comfortably! We don't spend much time playing games, but we want to be cool! " JETMAN " can respond to such feelings.

Jump and defeat your enemies!

The height of the jump changes depending on the length of the button hold. Let's make the best jump attack according to the position of the enemy.

There are more than 50 types of enemies!

Many enemies with unique looks and movements will appear. Let's identify the characteristics and capture them efficiently.

Accumulate JP (= junk points) to strengthen your character!

You can use the points earned in battle to strengthen your character. Whether to strengthen the attack or the defense. It's up to you to prioritize which one to strengthen.

Characters and stories that build the world.

A semi-android JET created by Dr. ARK to thwart the ambitions of the evil organization VIOLETS. A story that revolves around him will liven up the gameplay.

Fun after clearing the game.

A dedicated mode that you can play after clearing the main story. Please play " JETMAN " thoroughly!
